column4: RPT-FOCUS-Amazon expands in Cape Town  stepping up cloud rivalry with Microsoft
column5: CAPE TOWN  July 25 Amazon.com Inc is expanding its presence in the emerging tech hub of Cape Town  upping the ante in its regional battle with cloud computing rival Microsoft Corp.

column4: Qualcomm reports 4 percent rise in quarterly revenue
column5: Qualcomm Inc  reported a 4.2 percent rise in quarterly revenue on Wednesday  helped by demand for its latest Snapdragon chipset from smart phone customers including Samsung Electronics Co Ltd  and Xiaomi Corp .

column4: Qualcomm reports 4 pct rise in quarterly revenue
column5: July 25 Qualcomm Inc reported a 4.2 percent rise in quarterly revenue on Wednesday  helped by demand for its latest Snapdragon chipset from smart phone customers including Samsung Electronics Co Ltd and Xiaomi Corp .

column4: Options traders on edge as Qualcomm-NXP deal deadline looms
column5: NEW YORK Traders in the U.S. options market braced for a large near-term move in the shares of chipmaker Qualcomm Inc  and NXP Semiconductors  with hours to go before the deadline to get China's nod for a $44 billion deal.

column4: CORRECTED-China keeps Qualcomm guessing on NXP fate as bid enters final hours
column5: BEIJING/NEW YORK  July 25 Qualcomm Inc is yet to win China's nod to buy Dutch chipmaker NXP Semiconductors even as a deadline for the offer to expire is just hours away  raising the prospect the deal could be scuppered amid Sino-U.S. trade tensions.

column4: China says departments have had good communication with Qualcomm on NXP deal
column5: BEIJING China's foreign ministry said on Wednesday that relevant departments reviewing U.S. chipmaker Qualcomm Inc's  proposed $44 billion takeover of Dutch company NXP Semiconductors NV  have had good communication with Qualcomm over the issue.
